name: World Forum & Expo on 2D Materials and Graphene
content: World Forum & Expo on 2D Materials and Graphene, on March 10-12, 2025 at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. The objective of 2DMATFORUM2025 is to provide a world class platform to present and discuss all the latest research and results of scientists related to 2DMaterials and Graphene. This conference provides opportunities for the delegates to exchange new ideas and application experiences face to face, to establish business or research relations and to find global partners for future collaboration.
